NYC is grappling with severe winter weather, leading to the suspension of ferry services, dangerous wind chills, and travel disruptions, while alternate side parking is paused until February 1 due to snow. Additionally, public schools have reopened, and a contractor was suspended following a demolition collapse.

### Risks & Alerts

- NYC Ferry suspends service due to icy conditions. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- NYC faces dangerous cold as subzero wind chills move in. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMitAFBVV95cUxOdXdJcHFQcF9LemFKeDNEWEk0S0R0eDlteTJFZlJRZEFsd2NmY1Q5MVpNYXlDY2JuLXhHT0lTMHlIREt2Z2NLcHRlWGx6V2dTdmRnMmN5MTdyZGhmaXJUT3Jza2dQeDk3ajB1U1lDV2VLQTdMN3ZMWm5ReXdDQjlKU1lxVHE3eXFZeEMzTHNtaDRJNHFKRU9iQUlVMXBGQk91TlhqbkxjcFM1azJ6dkFHREVRUzc?oc=5)
- By land, sea and air, travel around NYC uneven following winter storm. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMimgFBVV95cUxNQ0l5bDhCNmtzNk1qVzRBTTh3WTQtTnlzNllFU2dJVEdtdWt1TlJ1UUlmTzFQSXdMWU5LMlFqZnhYMUJCSlVkRlJxNW04aGZnVVJmMzZnbGhZTkZRX0xIcHRVVTdGc1V2a2ozazA4TU1SdEdXLVFuRFhGVGpBUm9OTVBpcFBXRWxybUtoUXJvTHVBQXhMa2FSYjNn?oc=5)
- 2 firefighters, 2 residents injured in 2-alarm fire at Bronx home. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMirwFBVV95cUxOWHQxZzMzS242RVhfdjQzeWVDNGhveTBzOWljX3BObXVMaG84dU1RN0gxYnBIVzUzUXN6RXhINDkxaDA5bjMyTHJtMEZTMncxdnFvM2JrWktMTGNvX0RRam1ydWE4R0dUS3hBdGVJdlUxcFNKMEVNdlJRbmlUSGMxaGVkVllILWVRZC02aGRfSFRISUxraWkwYWVrU2Fzc09aMWJ4ZmVLZzRxZjFmN1I0?oc=5)
